name: KapiPlara
description: Kapi Plara is a beloved character and the close friend of MooDeng, both residents of Khao Kaew Zoo. Kapi Plara embodies the spirit of playfulness and community, symbolizing the values of friendship, collaboration, and the joy of exploring nature. Through storytelling and engaging activities, Kapi Plara brings awareness to wildlife conservation, encouraging people to connect with animals and support sustainable efforts in preserving their natural habitats.
